trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token that asserts that the subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: 代表用於宣告<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref>判斷提示在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證主體的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>安全性權杖會指定其宣告使用 SAML 判斷提示，可指定主體通過驗證時。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: 在 SAML 判斷提示的宣告會表示以 SAML 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a SamlAuthenticationStatement.
trans-unit.target: SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，且其中一個為 SamlAuthenticationStatement。

trans-unit.source: A SamlAuthenticationStatement asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: 為 SamlAuthenticationStatement 判斷提示陳述式的主體通過驗證在特定時間以特定方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref> class using the specified authentication details.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement"></xref>類別使用指定的驗證詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法集合是可延伸。但是下表包含 SAML 規格中定義的驗證方法的集合。

trans-unit.source: |Authentication method|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| When the `authenticationMethod` parameter is `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: |驗證方法 |URI | |---------------------------|---------| |密碼 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:password | |Kerberos | urn: ietf:rfc:1510 | |安全遠端密碼 (SRP) | urn: ietf:rfc:2945 | |硬體 Token |URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken | |SSL/TLS 憑證基礎的用戶端驗證 | urn: ietf:rfc:2246 | |PGP 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:PGP | |SPKI 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:SPKI | |XKMS 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:XKMS | |XML 數位簽章 | urn: ietf:rfc:3075 | |未指定 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am︰ 未指定 | 當`authenticationMethod`參數是`null`，驗證方法設定為`urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"></xref> that represents the subject of the claim.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject"> </xref>表示宣告的主體。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 指定主體的驗證方式的 URI 參考。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定主體通過的驗證的瞬間。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: DNS 網域名稱驗證主體之電腦的所在。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>型別的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"> </xref> ，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: authorityBindings contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: authorityBindings包含成員為 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a claim based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 將這個執行個體與指定的宣告集合的內容為基礎的宣告。

trans-unit.source: The AddClaimsToList method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: AddClaimsToList 方法新增宣告至`claims`參數根據<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>，和屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.ClaimType%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"></xref> that contains the set of claims to add to.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>型別的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim"> </xref> ，其中包含要新增的集合。

trans-unit.source: claims is .
trans-unit.target: claimsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定主體通過的驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: The time is stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 時間會儲存在 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationInstant property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationInstant 屬性會對應至`AuthenticationInstant`屬性`<AuthenticationStatement>`定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS 安全性聲明標記語言 (SAML) 規格的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，指定主體通過的驗證的瞬間。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Exception type
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 狀況

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationInstant property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationInstant 屬性設定和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法集合是可延伸。但是下表包含 SAML 規格中定義的驗證方法的集合。

trans-unit.source: |Authentication method|URI| |---------------------------|---------| |Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |Kerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified| When the AuthenticationMethod property is set to `null`, the authentication method is set to `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`.
trans-unit.target: |驗證方法 |URI | |---------------------------|---------| |密碼 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:password | |Kerberos | urn: ietf:rfc:1510 | |安全遠端密碼 (SRP) | urn: ietf:rfc:2945 | |硬體 Token |URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken | |SSL/TLS 憑證基礎的用戶端驗證 | urn: ietf:rfc:2246 | |PGP 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:PGP | |SPKI 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:SPKI | |XKMS 公開金鑰 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am:XKMS | |XML 數位簽章 | urn: ietf:rfc:3075 | |未指定 | urn: oasis︰ 名稱︰ tc: SAML:1.0:am︰ 未指定 | 當 AuthenticationMethod 屬性設定為`null`，驗證方法設定為`urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified`。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationMethod property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationMethod 屬性會對應至`AuthenticationMethod`屬性`<AuthenticationStatement>`定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS 安全性聲明標記語言 (SAML) 規格的項目。

trans-unit.source: The method used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" name="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" name="urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticationMethod property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: AuthenticationMethod 屬性設定和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The AuthorityBindings property corresponds to a set of `<AuthorityBinding>` child elements for an `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: AuthorityBindings 屬性會對應至一組`<AuthorityBinding>`子項目`<AuthenticationStatement>`定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS 安全性聲明標記語言 (SAML) 規格的項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>型別的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"> </xref> ，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性宣告的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"></xref> that specifies the type of security claim.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"> </xref>指定安全性宣告的型別。

trans-unit.source: Always `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication`.
trans-unit.target: 一律`http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthentication`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證主體之電腦的所在的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The DnsAddress property corresponds to the `DNSAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: DnsAddress 屬性會對應至`DNSAddress`屬性`<SubjectLocality>`定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS 安全性聲明標記語言 (SAML) 規格的項目。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: DNS 網域名稱驗證主體之電腦的所在。

trans-unit.source: The DnsAddress property is set and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: DnsAddress 屬性設定和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The IPAddress property corresponds to the `IPAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: IPAddress 屬性會對應至`IPAddress`屬性`<SubjectLocality>`定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS 安全性聲明標記語言 (SAML) 規格的項目。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個執行個體的屬性是否是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓這個執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>類別唯讀的呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個執行個體的屬性是唯讀的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使得這個執行個體處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 MakeReadOnly 方法時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`和不再可以設定這個執行個體的屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reads the SAML authentication statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 XML 讀取器讀取 SAML 驗證陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>, and properties.
trans-unit.target: ReadXml 方法會設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A>，和屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.IPAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.DnsAddress%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthorityBindings%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationInstant%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>要讀取 SAML 驗證陳述式。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authentication statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref>能夠讀取 SAML 規格中所定義的 SAML 驗證陳述式中的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>讀取<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> ，判定建立數位簽章的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is

trans-unit.source: reader refers to an XML element that does not contain the and attributes.
trans-unit.target: reader不包含的 XML 項目是指和屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or- reader refers to an XML element that does not have a child element.
trans-unit.target: -reader指的是 XML 項目，但是沒有子項目。

trans-unit.source: Writes the SAML authentication statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 將 SAML 驗證陳述式寫入至指定的 XML 序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the SAML authentication statement.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>要寫入 SAML 驗證陳述式。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref>能夠在 SAML 判斷提示中撰寫 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref>能夠寫入<xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref>子句。

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is .
